resources.string: Your Profile Details are listed below:
This notification confirms that the order is placed
You do not have any favorite restaurants
You haven\'t placed any orders yet

Food Runner App is the mobile application with a sole objective of empowering small businesses, local food outlets and other businesses with a tool that enables them to reach customers within a few taps on the screen. Developed by ValueAppz, this mobile application helps you combat the terror of e-commerce giants that are becoming more and more gigantic. With the help of this app, the restaurant owners can market their menu online and also manage everything, from buying process to tracking payments- on their smartphones devices.

A.2 Absolutely! This app is for all those restaurants that have a compelling menu, but are lagging behind simply because they have no online presence. Food Runner App gives you your dose of local SEO by empowering you, and helping you reach customers.

A.4 Unlike other apps, Food Runner App gives you complete ownership of the app control panel. Your customers belong to you and we entirely allow you to manage them. We allow you to manage the customer details, orders and payments. A simple demo will help you run your business easily through your restaurants mobile app.
A.3 Yes, initially our app developer will setup the complete menu as per your requirements. However, later you will have access to add, edit and delete items as per your requirements.

A.5 Of course. Its your app and it completely belongs to you. We have provided few options to customize the app. You may find the customization features on the apps dashboard, which will allow you to make modifications to the app, as requested. For further details, kindly contact our support team.

A.6 Your application setting allows you to easily add, edit and delete content from your dashboard within minutes. You can update your app content everyday if you want to.For custom changes, our mobile app development team will assist you depending on the type of change you want in the app.
